As an IT Co-op Student, you will have the opportunity to gain hands-on experience in various aspects of Information Technology while working closely with experienced professionals in the field. This position offers valuable exposure to real-world IT projects and technologies, allowing you to apply your skills and knowledge in a practical setting.
